basic.login: log into the selected registry, generating and storing an auth token
basic.whoami: respond with the name of the authenticated user
basic.publish: publish a new package-version, creating a package as a side effect if necessary
basic.download: fetch & insert into cache the content blobs for the named package-version
basic.invite: |cinvite [name] --to pkg/namespace|c invites the namespace to join the maintainers list
basic.join: accept an invitation to join a namespace or maintain a package
basic.decline: decline an invitation to join a namespace or package maintainers list
basic.members: show members of a namespace OR list all maintainers of a package
